Check the list of all visa-exempt countries \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://mfa.gov.il/MFA/ConsularServices/Documents/VisaRequirements-Tourists.pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are now in Israel as a visitor and work for EPAM in another country, please notify your Resource Manager and submit \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?orderitem=caRemoteWorkApproval\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"remote work request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" as soon as possible. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What to do next?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While you are in the visitor status, please refrain from going to local office to work – Israeli immigration rules are rather strict and visitors should not work, even remotely, without proper authorization. Please limit visits to the office to informal meeting with the colleagues.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you need local help, please contact:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Israel Country Head: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Yoni_Okun@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yoni Okun\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Local HR: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Adi_Balanga_Cohen@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Adi Balanga Cohen\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Can I officially relocate to Israel now that I am in the country?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Relocation to Israel is a lengthy process that requires multiple approvals, that’s why immediate hiring is not possible. If you are in Israel as a visitor, please get in touch with your Resource Manager to discuss suitable fast-track relocation options. Please be mindful of your 90 days’ visitor status deadline.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are process\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to start the process – Internal Mobility team will check if there are suitable opportunities  in Israel that can match your skillset. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=26a40ebb-abeb-453e-bdbb-148d9819ea02&source=PROGRAM\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support Groups\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Here, in a very safe space, you can meet colleagues who may be dealing with similar situations to share your experiences, stories, emotions and draw strength from each other.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All group meetings are moderated by an EPAM coach who facilitates discussions, topics, and the overall process. This format is not the classic therapy, but a resource group field to get emotional support at any level of engagement  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you’re feeling struggled alone, join us and we’ll help you to find inner resources to rebuild your life. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
